data.text: @KRISTINAKAY @thehill That's not how it works, gas prices won't come down until Biden lifts his criminal sanctions designed to starve hundreds of millions of innocent civilians.
@thehill Sure would be nice if we doubled this rather than sending $14 billion to neo-nazi militias this week.

@KRISTINAKAY @thehill You are a moron.  You also have no idea how the real world works.  How do you think food gets to your grocery store?  How do you think electricity is maintained in your home?  How do you think Walmart or your corner CVS get their goods?
@thehill It should be $0.  Fund our southern border.  Build the wall.  Protect America First.
@thehill They haven't spent all the money they were already given.  Why give them more?
@thehill Pretending Covid is over is gonna get a lot more Americans killed.
@thehill The Scamdemic is over. Stop wasting taxpayer money!
@thehill Meanwhile Americans can do this to drive gas prices down. Americans have the power!! #gas #gasprices https://t.co/RuJL0mv6k7
@thehill Made in the USA covid tests?
